Trample
[i]Aymr[/i] – When you cast Edelgard, Adrestian Emperor, destroy any number of target artifacts with mana value 2 or less.
[i]Flickering Flower[/i] – Whenever Edelgard deals combat damage to a player, exile the top two cards of your library. You may play those cards until your next turn.
[i]Promoted Class[/i] – {1}{B}{R}
